verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H3898>eat<s%> with a <S%H4910>ruler,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> diligently <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you:
And <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to your <S%H3930>throat,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you be a <S%H1167>man<s%> <S%H1167>given<s%> to <S%H5315>appetite.<s%>
Be not <S%H183>desirous<s%> of his <S%H4303>dainties:<s%> for they are <S%H3577>deceitful<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%>
<S%H3021>Labor<s%> not to be <S%H6238>rich:<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from your own <S%H998>wisdom.<s%>

Will you <S%H5774>set<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on that which is not? for riches certainly <S%H6213>make<s%> themselves <S%H3671>wings;<s%> they <S%H5774>fly<s%> away as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
<S%H3898>Eat<s%> you not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of him that has an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H183>desire<s%> you his <S%H4303>dainty<s%> meats:
For as he <S%H8176>thinks<s%> in his <S%H5315>heart,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is he: <S%H398>Eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> he to you; but his <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not with you.
The <S%H6595>morsel<s%> which you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> shall you <S%H6958>vomit<s%> up, and <S%H7843>lose<s%> your <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>
<S%H1696>Speak<s%> not in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool:<s%> for he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of your <S%H4405>words.<s%>
<S%H5253>Remove<s%> not the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H1366>landmark;<s%> and <S%H935>enter<s%> not into the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless:<s%>
For their <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>mighty;<s%> he shall <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>cause<s%> with you.
<S%H935>Apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
<S%H4513>Withhold<s%> not <S%H4148>correction<s%> from the <S%H5288>child:<s%> for if you <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>
You shall <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>hell.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H589>mine.<s%>
Yes, my <S%H3629>reins<s%> shall <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> when your <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H4339>right<s%> things.
Let not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners:<s%> but be you in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
For surely there is an <S%H319>end;<s%> and your <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> and <S%H833>guide<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Be not among <S%H5433>winebibbers;<s%> <S%H3196><s%> among <S%H2151>riotous<s%> <S%H2151>eaters<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh:<s%>
For the <S%H5435>drunkard<s%> and the <S%H2151>glutton<s%> shall come to <S%H3423>poverty:<s%> and <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> a man with <S%H7168>rags.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to your <S%H1>father<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> you, and <S%H936>despise<s%> not your <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> she is <S%H2204>old.<s%>
<S%H7069>Buy<s%> the <S%H571>truth,<s%> and <S%H4376>sell<s%> it not; also <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall greatly <S%H1523>rejoice:<s%> and he that <S%H3205>begets<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> child shall have <S%H8056>joy<s%> of him.
Your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H8056>glad,<s%> and she that <S%H3205>bore<s%> you shall <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5341>observe<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For a <S%H2181>whore<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>ditch;<s%> and a <S%H5237>strange<s%> woman is a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H875>pit.<s%>
She <S%H637>also<s%> lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> as for a <S%H2863>prey,<s%> and <S%H3254>increases<s%> the <S%H898>transgressors<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H188>woe?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H17>sorrow?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H4079>contentions?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H7879>babbling?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H6482>wounds<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H2448>redness<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>
They that <S%H309>tarry<s%> long <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3196>wine;<s%> they that <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>seek<s%> <S%H4469>mixed<s%> <S%H4469>wine.<s%>

<S%H7200>Look<s%> not you on the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it is <S%H119>red,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H5869>color<s%> in the <S%H3599>cup,<s%> when it <S%H1980>moves<s%> itself <S%H4339>aright.<s%>
At the <S%H319>last<s%> it <S%H5391>bites<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> and <S%H6567>stings<s%> like an <S%H6848>adder.<s%>
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> women, and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H8419>perverse<s%> things.
Yes, you shall be as he that <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> or as he that <S%H7901>lies<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2260>mast.<s%>

They have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> me, shall you say, and I was not <S%H2470>sick;<s%> they have <S%H1986>beaten<s%> me, and I <S%H3045>felt<s%> it not: <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6974>awake?<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> it yet <S%H5750>again.<s%>
